ygData.messageBody:
Ok y'all, the thing i cannot understand is how Verant overlooked the fact
that there is no numerical representative number for amount of mana. I
mean, in battle a fighter can always look at his HP status, but in 12 levels
of play my int is still the same and im SURE i have been getting a higher
mana limit each level, but how much???

Does anyone know the formula used to calculate mana points?
I would like to see a meter like MP/MP just like the HP/HP bar that all
classes have.

Since nooen else seems to be really bitching about this i will assume that
the answer is right in front of my face and i just cannot see it.
Help...anyone?
